title: riot respone only..can i use custom skins
body: I want to download adventure teemo but I was wondering if I can use custom skins aslong its not a skin riot had created.

replies.body: We don't support third party modifications, so using it is at your own risk.  We won't necessarily suspend you for using that, but our [stance ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)could change.  We also won't be able to support you if you run into technical issues or if there's malicious content hiding in the mod you're using.  Be wary!
